Class HarmonicOscillatorPredictor

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.api.HarmonicOscillatorPredictor
All Implemented Interfaces:
PredictionModel
public final class HarmonicOscillatorPredictor extends Object implements PredictionModel
Phase-aware predictor tuned for oscillating signals (e.g., ECG-like waves).

It estimates a dominant period via positive-slope zero crossings and extrapolates with A * sin(w * (x - x0)) + C. When insufficient crossings are available, it falls back to the linear predictor.

Since:
1.5.0
Version:
1.7.0
Author:
Arber Gashi
